column3:
誰だ君は？

ここはゾーラキングのおわす玉座の間
勝手に入ってはダメ……
column4: And who might you be?The Zora king is not accepting visitors at this time.I shall escort you out.

column3: ひょっとして君はハイリア人か？
column4: Pardon my manners, but are you a Hylian?!

column3:
それなら話は別だ
ちょっとこっちに来てくれ
column4: Why didn't you say so in the first place?!Please, please, come in!
